fields.name: Display_Call_Assessment_Result_1
fields.fieldText:
Call quality evaluation is completed with a CQI Score of {!resultAssessmentSummary.Assessment_Score__c}

Click to {!resultAssessmentSummary.Record_Link__c} or click Finish to close this window

fields.name: Display_Score_Message
fields.fieldText:
Case quality evaluation is completed with a CQI Score of {!resultAssessmentSummary.Assessment_Score__c}


Click to {!resultAssessmentSummary.Record_Link__c} or click Finish to close this window

fields.name: Display_Error_KPI_Existing
fields.fieldText: Case quality evaluation has already been completed for this case

fields.name: No_Access_Error
fields.fieldText: You do not have permission to perform quality evaluation for this case/call.

fields.name: Display_Profile_Permission_Error
fields.fieldText: Your profile do not have permission to perform quality evaluation

fields.name: Display_No_Setup_Error
fields.fieldText: NO QUALITY ASSESSMENT SETUP FOUND. PLEASE CONTACT ADMIN.

fields.name: Display_Task_Not_Closed
fields.fieldText: Please make sure Call Activity (Task) is closed & is of Type: Call

variables.description: List variable to store the questions identified for the case record type.
variables.name: cqiQuestionsMetadata

variables.description: Variable that contains the results entered by end user. Information is output by a lightning component.
variables.name: flowVarAssessmentResults

variables.description: String instance to store the json result returned from the UI component in the String format.
variables.name: jsonResultsFromUI

variables.description:
List String instance for APEX Action input to create Assessment Result Child Records.
NOTE: This Apex Action is needed because, Lightning Flow, can't handle sobject output dynamically constructed from Component js. as of this version.
variables.name: lstStringInputs

variables.description: Instance variable to insert Case Assessment Summary
variables.name: newAssessmentSummary

variables.description: Instance to store the case owner user information.
variables.name: ownerUserInfo

variables.description: input record of current case record
variables.name: recordId

variables.description: Result returned from the sub flow to identify the question setup to be displayed for the coach users.
variables.name: setupId
